plot: A soldier is shot in the back. He is paralyzed. As he stares up into the sky waiting to die he hallucinates that he is the last man left on the planet earth.
title: No Monsters: Or How He Probably Thought He Was the Last Man to Die on the Planet Earth
plot_es: A soldier is shot in the back. He is paralyzed. As he stares up into the sky waiting to die he hallucinates that he is the last man left on the planet earth.
original_name: No Monsters: Or How He Probably Thought He Was the Last Man to Die on the Planet Earth
plot_en: A soldier is shot in the back. He is paralyzed. As he stares up into the sky waiting to die he hallucinates that he is the last man left on the planet earth.
